publicCancel().details: Cancel escrow and refund to resolver after timeout Anyone can call this after timeout

publicWithdraw(bytes32).details: Public withdraw function (anyone can call after timeout with correct secret)

withdraw(bytes32).details: User withdraws resolver's tokens by revealing secret Only user (taker) can call this before timeout
